tool.name: GmxCluster
tool.description: : Wrapper of the GROMACS cluster module for clustering structures from a given GROMACS compatible trajectory.

param.name: input_structure_path
param.label: input TPR,GRO,G96,PDB,BRK,ENT file
param.help: Path to the input structure file. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: input_traj_path
param.label: input XTC,TRR,CPT,GRO,G96,PDB,TNG file
param.help: Path to the GROMACS trajectory file. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: input_index_path
param.label: input NDX file
param.help: Path to the GROMACS index file. Format: [input].ndx

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output XTC,TRR,CPT,GRO,G96,PDB,TNG name
param.help: Path to the output cluster file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: fit_selection
param.label: fit_selection
param.help: Group where the fitting will be performed. If **input_index_path** provided, check the file for the accepted values.
param.option: System - all atoms in the system
Backbone - protein backbone atoms: N; C-alpha and C
MainChain - protein main chain atoms: N; C-alpha; C and O; including oxygens in C-terminus
MainChain+Cb - protein main chain atoms including C-beta
MainChain+H - protein main chain atoms including backbone amide hydrogens and hydrogens on the N-terminus
SideChain - protein side chain atoms: that is all atoms except N; C-alpha; C; O; backbone amide hydrogens and oxygens in C-terminus and hydrogens on the N-terminus
SideChain-H - protein side chain atoms excluding all hydrogens
Prot-Masses - protein atoms excluding dummy masses
non-Water - anything not covered by the Water group
Ion - any name matching an Ion entry in residuetypes.dat
Water_and_ions - combination of the Water and Ions groups

param.name: output_selection
param.label: output_selection
param.help: Group that is going to be written in the output trajectory. If **input_index_path** provided, check the file for the accepted values.
param.option: System - all atoms in the system
Backbone - protein backbone atoms: N; C-alpha and C
MainChain - protein main chain atoms: N; C-alpha; C and O; including oxygens in C-terminus
MainChain+Cb - protein main chain atoms including C-beta
MainChain+H - protein main chain atoms including backbone amide hydrogens and hydrogens on the N-terminus
SideChain - protein side chain atoms: that is all atoms except N; C-alpha; C; O; backbone amide hydrogens and oxygens in C-terminus and hydrogens on the N-terminus
SideChain-H - protein side chain atoms excluding all hydrogens
Prot-Masses - protein atoms excluding dummy masses
non-Water - anything not covered by the Water group
Ion - any name matching an Ion entry in residuetypes.dat
Water_and_ions - combination of the Water and Ions groups

param.name: dista
param.label: dista
param.help: Use RMSD of distances instead of RMS deviation.

param.name: method
param.label: method
param.option: linkage - Add a structure to a cluster when its distance to any element of the cluster is less than cutoff
jarvis-patrick - Add a structure to a cluster when this structure and a structure in the cluster have each other as neighbors and they have a least P neighbors in common
monte-carlo - Reorder the RMSD matrix using Monte Carlo such that the order of the frames is using the smallest possible increments
gromos - Count number of neighbors using cut-off and take structure with largest number of neighbors with all its neighbors as cluster and eliminate it from the pool of clusters

param.name: cutoff
param.label: cutoff
param.help: RMSD cut-off (nm) for two structures to be neighbor.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the GROMACS executable binary.
